0.text: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal 80% AD magic damage and 20% AD physical damage.
0.html: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal 80% AD magic damage and 20% AD physical damage.

1.text: Innate - The Package: After 10:00,  The Package is delivered to both corners of the allied fountain, which can be selected by Corki to pick up after  channeling for 1 second. Upon completion of the channel, Corki gains one cast of  Special Delivery for 60 seconds, replacing  Valkyrie for the duration. While holding the  The Package, Corki gains  40% bonus movement speed out of combat and  ghosting.
1.html: Innate - The Package: After 10:00, The Package is delivered to both corners of the allied fountain, which can be selected by Corki to pick up after channeling for 1 second. Upon completion of the channel, Corki gains one cast of Special Delivery for 60 seconds, replacing Valkyrie for the duration. While holding the The Package, Corki gains  40% bonus movement speed out of combat and ghosting.

2.text: Corki cannot start the  channel to pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.
2.html: Corki cannot start the channel to pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  275

0.text: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target location that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Corki launches a bomb at the target location that explodes upon impact, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: The bomb also grants  sight of the area for 6 seconds and  reveals enemy  champions hit for the same duration.
1.html: The bomb also grants sight of the area for 6 seconds and reveals enemy champions hit for the same duration.

1.text: COLLISION RADIUS: 100

0.text: Active: Corki  dashes to the target location and drops bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled. Each patch lasts 2 seconds.
0.html: Active: Corki dashes to the target location and drops bombs that leave up to 3 blazing patches along his path, depending on the distance traveled. Each patch lasts 2 seconds.

1.text: Enemies within the patches are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
1.html: Enemies within the patches are dealt magic damage every 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Gatling Gun can be cast during the dash. Valkyrie will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Gatling Gun can be cast during the dash. Valkyrie will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.text: COLLISION RADIUS: 100

0.text: Active: Corki  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location,  knocking aside all enemies in his path 500 units and leaving behind a trail of fire for 5 seconds, which grants  sight of the area for its duration and for 3 seconds afterwards.
0.html: Active: Corki dashes with displacement immunity to the target location, knocking aside all enemies in his path 500 units and leaving behind a trail of fire for 5 seconds, which grants sight of the area for its duration and for 3 seconds afterwards.

1.text: Enemies hit by Corki's dash or within the trail are burned and  slowed by 90% for 2 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while inside the area. The burn deals 7.5 − 25 (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds.
1.html: Enemies hit by Corki's dash or within the trail are burned and slowed by 90% for 2 seconds, refreshing every 0.25 seconds while inside the area. The burn deals 7.5 − 25 (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) (+ 6% AP) magic damage every 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Casting Special Delivery instantly resets  Valkyrie's  cooldown.
2.html: Casting Special Delivery instantly resets Valkyrie's  cooldown.

3.text: Special Delivery will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: Special Delivery will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.text: ANGLE:  35°

0.text: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a cone toward his facing direction for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the targets'  armor and  magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times and lasting for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent ticks.
0.html: Active: Corki sprays bullets in a cone toward his facing direction for 4 seconds, dealing equal parts physical and magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all enemies hit, and reducing the targets'  armor and  magic resistance with each tick, stacking up to 8 times and lasting for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent ticks.

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  150 / 300

0.text: Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.
0.html: Active: Corki fires a missile in the target direction that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area.

1.text: Corki periodically stocks a Missile Barrage charge, up to a maximum of 7. He gains maximum charges upon respawning.
1.html: Corki periodically stocks a Missile Barrage charge, up to a maximum of 7. He gains maximum charges upon respawning.

2.text: Every third missile Corki fires is a  Big One, dealing 100% increased damage as well as gaining increased range and explosion radius.
2.html: Every third missile Corki fires is a Big One, dealing 100% increased damage as well as gaining increased range and explosion radius.

0.text: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal 80% AD magic damage and 20% AD physical damage.
0.html: Innate - Hextech Shrapnel Shells: Corki's basic attacks are modified to deal 80% AD magic damage and 20% AD physical damage.

1.text: Innate - The Package: After 10:00,  The Package is delivered to both corners of the allied fountain, which can be selected by Corki to pick up after  channeling for 1 second. Upon completion of the channel, Corki gains one cast of  Special Delivery for 60 seconds, replacing  Valkyrie for the duration. While holding the  The Package, Corki gains  40% bonus movement speed out of combat and  ghosting.

2.text: Corki cannot start the  channel to pick up the package while he is unable to cast abilities.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+240 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to maximum of 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+35 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Muramana at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus attack damage equal to 2.5% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1050

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana
+6 magic penetration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+70 attack damage
+20 ability haste
+10% omnivamp

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Cleave: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal 60% − 12% (based on distance) AD physical damage to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CLEAVE: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage from abilities deal 60% − 12% (based on distance) AD physical damage to other enemies near the target. Can only hit each target once per attack or ability, and may only trigger once every 10 seconds from the same cast.

Passive

Unique – Cinderbloom: Dealing magic damage to champions ignores 10 − 20 (based on target's current health) of their magic resistance, increased to maximum value if the they were affected by a shield within the last 5 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
